Get the default mappings for the application of the connection template passed in templateToApply

The result IdeaStatiCa.Api.Connection.Model.TemplateConversionsDefault mapping to apply the passed template.
It can be modified by a user and used for the application of a template M:IdeaStatiCa.ConnectionRestApi.Controllers.TemplateController.ApplyConnectionTemplateAsync(System.Guid,System.Int32,IdeaStatiCa.Api.Connection.Model.ConTemplateApplyParam) method.

Anchor3D.description: Representation of Anchor 3D in IDEA StatiCa Detail

washerSize.description: Washer Size used if AnchorType is washer

id.description: Unique Id of the bolt grid

diagonalHeadDiameter.description: The Diagonal Head Diameter of bolt

tensileStressArea.description: The Tensile Stress Area of bolt

boltAssemblyName.description: The description of the bolt assembly

standard.description: The standard of the bolt assembly

material.description: The material of the bolt assembly

positions.description: Positions of holes in the local coodinate system of the bolt grid

shearInThread.description: Indicates, whether a shear plane is in the thread of a bolt.

AnchorType.description: Defines a type of anchor end.

ArcSegment3D.description: Represents an arc segment in three-dimensional space.

BasePlate3D.description: Representation of Base Plate 3D in IDEA StatiCa Detail

Beam.description: Representation of 1D member in IDEA StatiCa Detail

originalModelId.description:
Get or set the identification in the original model
In the case of the imported connection from another application

refLineInCenterOfGravity.description: The reference line of the member is in the center of gravity of the cross-section

autoAddCutByWorkplane.description: Automaticali add cut by workplane if it not defined

BeamData.description: Provides data of the connected beam

id.description: Unique Id of the bolt grid

diagonalHeadDiameter.description: The Diagonal Head Diameter of bolt

tensileStressArea.description: The Tensile Stress Area of bolt

boltAssemblyName.description: The description of the bolt assembly

standard.description: The standard of the bolt assembly

material.description: The material of the bolt assembly

positions.description: Positions of holes in the local coodinate system of the bolt grid

shearInThread.description: Indicates, whether a shear plane is in the thread of a bolt.

BoltShearType.description: Defines a transfer of shear force in bolts.

items.description: In case of presentation of groups plates (uncoiled beams)

skipped.description:
Whether the check was calculated or not.
If true, the check was not calculated and IdeaRS.OpenModel.Connection.CheckResSummary.CheckValue should be ignored, otherwise false.

items.description: In case of presentation of groups plates (uncoiled beams)

region.description: Geometry of the concrete block in svg format

originalModelId.description:
Get or set the identification in the original model
In the case of the imported connection from another application

ConcreteBlockData.description: Provides data of the single concrete block

checkResPlate.description: List of check results for plates

checkResWeld.description: List of check results for welds

checkResBolt.description: List of check results for bolts

checkResAnchor.description: List of check results for anchors

checkResConcreteBlock.description: List of check results for concrete blocks

bucklingResults.description: List of results of buckling analysis

boltGrids.description: Bolt grids which belongs to the connection

anchorGrids.description: Anchor grids which belongs to the connection

stopAtLimitStrain.description: Stop analysis when the limit strain is reached.

pretensionForceFpc.description: Pretension force fpc = k * fub * As

gammaInst.description: Partial safety factor of instalation safety

anchorLengthForStiffness.description: Length of anchor to define the anchor stiffness in analysis model, as a multiple of anchor diameter (E A /n * [d])

jointBetaFactor.description: Joint coefficient j - Used for Fjd calculation

effectiveAreaStressCoeff.description: Effective area is taken from intersection of stress area and area of joined items according to EN1993-1-8 art. 6.2.5

effectiveAreaStressCoeffAISC.description: Effective area stress coefficient - Concrete loaded area: Stress cut-off is set for AISC

frictionCoefficient.description: Coefficient of friction between base plate and concrete block

limitPlasticStrain.description: Limit of plastic strain used in 2D plate element check

limitDeformationCheck.description: Limit deformation on closed sections check or not

distanceBetweenBolts.description: Limit distance between bolts as a multiple of bolt diameter

distanceBetweenBoltsEdge.description: Limit distance between bolt and plate edge as a multiple of bolt diameter

bearingAngle.description: Load distribution angle of concrete block in calculation of factor Kj

decreasingFtrd.description: Decreasing Ftrd of anchors. Worse quality influence

bracedSystem.description: Consider the frame system as braced for stiffness calculation. Braced system reduces horizontal displacements.

applyBetapInfluence.description: Apply p influence in bolt shear resistance.  1993-1-8 chapter 3.6.1 (12)

memberLengthRatio.description: A multiple of cross-section height to determine the default length of member

divisionOfSurfaceOfCHS.description: Number of straight lines to substitute circle of circular tube in analysis model

divisionOfArcsOfRHS.description: Number of straight lines to substitute corner arc of rectangular tubes in analysis model

numElement.description: Ratio of length of decisive plate edge and Elements on edge count determines the average size of mesh element

numberIterations.description: More iterations helps to find better solutions in contact elements but increases calculation time

mdiv.description: Number of iteration steps to evaluate analysis divergence

minSize.description: Minimal size of generated finite mesh element

maxSize.description: Maximal size of generated finite mesh element

numElementRhs.description: Number of mesh elements in RHS height

numElementPlate.description: Number of mesh elements on plates

rigidBP.description: True if rigid base plate is considered

crackedConcrete.description: True if cracked concrete is considered

developedFillers.description: True if developed fillers is considered

deformationBoltHole.description: True if bolt hole deformation is considered

fatigueSectionOffset.description: Fatigue section Offset = FatigueSectionOffset x Legsize

condensedElementLengthFactor.description: Condensed element length factor (CEF). Condensed beam legth = maxCssSize * CEF

gammaMu.description: Partial safety factor for Horizontal tying

hssLimitPlasticStrain.description: Limit plastic strain for high strength steel

isInPrincipal.description: Specifies that the cross-section is in its principal axis.

weldThickness.description: Thickness of the weld - value 0 = recommended size

extendBeforeCut.description: Extend before cut - for cuts where user can decide if modified beam will be extended or not

CutBeamByBeamData.description: Provides data of the cut objec by object

CutData.description: Provides data of the cut beam

CutOrientation.description: Represents the type of the cut

DappedEnd.description: Representation of dapped end in IDEA StatiCa Detail

DistanceComparison.description: Represents the result of comparison of distances of two object from the same point

plates.description: List of plates belong to folded plate

bends.description: List of bends connected plates of foldedplate

FoldedPlateData.description: Provides data of the folded plate

InitialImperfectionOfPoint.description: Initial deformation of point - geometry nonlinear calculation

LineSegment3D.description: Represents a line segment in three-dimensional space.

isDefaultMaterial.description: True if material is default material from the code

orderInCode.description: Order of this material in the code

Open element base class

patchDevice.description: List of dapped ends in Detail

pointSupportNode.description: List of Point support in node

lineSupportSegment.description: List of Line support on segment

loadsOnLine.description: List of line load impulses in this load case

pointLoadsOnLine.description: List of point load impulses in this load case

temperatureLoadsOnLine.description: List of temperature load in this load case

reinforcement.description: List of reinforcement in IDEA StatiCa Detail

concreteCheckSection.description: List of the concrete check section

rebarShape.description: Gets or sets the rebars shapes

rebarGeneral.description: Gets or sets the rebar General collection

rebarSingle.description: Gets or sets the rebar single collection

rebarStirrups.description: Gets or sets the rebar group (stirrups) collection

OpenModelContainer.description:
OpenModelContainer is used to keep structural data and results of a finite element analysis in one place.
The main reason is easier moving (passing) pass the instance of OpenModel and corresponding instace of OpenModelResults.

Opening.description: Representation of opening in IDEA StatiCa Detail

region.description: Geometry of the plate in svg format. In next version will be mark as OBSOLETE! New use property Geometry

originalModelId.description:
Get or set the identification in the original model
In the case of the imported connection from another application

PlateData.description: Provides data of the single plate

x.description: Gets or sets the X-coordinate value

y.description: Gets or sets the Y-coordinate value

Point2D.description: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

x.description: Gets or sets the X-coordinate value

y.description: Gets or sets the Y-coordinate value

z.description: Gets or sets the Z-coordinate value

Point3D.description: Represents an x- , y- an z-coordinates in three-dimensional space.

PointLoadOnLine.description: Load in specific point on line

PointOnLine3D.description: Represents a Point dependent on the line in three-dimensional space.

PolyLine2D.description: Represents a polyline in two-dimensional space.

PolyLine3D.description: Represents a polyline in three-dimensional space.

Polygon2D.description: Represents a polygon in two-dimensional space.

ProjectData.description: Defines certain data about user project.

RebarGeneral.description:
Represents a single main rebar in 3D space.
Holds data from generated rebar or rebar imported from Tekla.
the rebarShape is in global coordinates and it is not possible to prject it along Member1D, Polyline, ... (referenceLine)

RebarShape.description: Represents a geometrical shape for Rebar in 3D space.

RebarSingle.description: Represents a single main rebar in 3D space.

RebarStirrups.description: Represents a rebar grouping in 3D space.

openings.description: Gets or sets the list of openings in the Region2D.

Region2D.description: Represents a region in two-dimensional space included outline (border) and openings.

Region3D.description: Represents a region in three-dimensional space included outline (border) and openings.

Reinforcement.description: Base class representing reinforcement in IDEA StatiCa Detail

ResultLocalSystemType.description: Type of local system of result

Segment2D.description: Represents a segment in two-dimensional space.

SolidBlock3D.description: Representation of Solid Block in IDEA StatiCa Detail

Span.description:
Span allows specifying haunched member.

Both cross-section must be of the same type. Spans must not overlap.

diameterOfMandrel.description: Radius of stirrup mandrel - refering to stirrup axis

shearCheck.description: Status of shear check, not possible for detailing stirrup

torsionCheck.description: Status of torsion check, not possible for detailing stirrup

StrainLoadOnLine.description:
Linearly distributed generalized strain load along a line.
Strain load is in local coordinate system and there are no possible eccentricities.

SurfaceSupport3D.description: Representation of Surface Support 3D in IDEA StatiCa Detail

Taper.description:
Defines haunches (variyng cross-sections) along the member.

One IdeaRS.OpenModel.Model.Taper may be assigned to multiple <see cref="T:IdeaRS.OpenModel.Model.Member1D">Members</see>.
Sections of the member not covered by a span will use the member's cross-section.

isDebondingTube.description: rue for debonding tubes, false for tendon ducts

ThermalSpecificHeatState.description: Type of curvature - thermal specific heat

ThermalStrainState.description: Type of curvature - thermal strain curvature

ThermalStressStrainState.description: Type of curvature - thermal stress-strain curvature

x.description: Gets or sets the X-dirrection value

y.description: Gets or sets the Y-dirrection value

z.description: Gets or sets the Z-dirrection value

Vector3D.description: Represents a vector in three-dimensional space.

Wall.description: Representation of Wall in IDEA StatiCa Detail

WeldData.description: Provides data of the single weld
